Introduction
------------

Implementation of the `RIPEMD160` precompiled contract.


.. only:: stage1

---------------

Module Details
---------------

ripemd160
~~~~~~~~~


.. function:: ripemd160(evm: ethereum.constantinople.vm.Evm) -> None
   :noindexentry:

   Writes the ripemd160 hash to output.

   :param evm: The current EVM frame.
